http://www.techbargains.com/lenovo -- Check out the latest coupons and deals for Lenovo products here.

Here's our review of the Lenovo Thinkpad Tablet. Specs include an Nvidia Tegra 2 dual core processor running at 1GHz, 10.1 inch display with a native resolution of 1280x800, Android 3.1, 1GB of RAM, 64GB of storage, rear facing 5MP camera and front facing 2MP camera.
